document_data.name: Glaur
document_data.mainbody: A '''glaur''' was a short curved valved [[horn]], popular among [[bard]]s in the [[Realms]]. It was similar to a cornucopia and sounded like a [[trumpet]].
document_data.Description:
The glaur was a more versatile instrument than other trumpets. Its sound was brash and metallic. Glaurs made of brass, silver and electrum were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.

A variant of the glaur without the valves was called a [[gloon]] and had a more mournful sound.
document_data.Notable Glaurs: * Following the [[Spellplague]], there was known to exist in the Realms a legendary glaur from [[Elturgard]] that was valved and plated in electrum. It had a unique curvature to it that produced a brash, metallic roar that was unlike any other glaur. Legends claimed that it had once been blown by the god [[Torm]].

Notable Users.Individuals: * [[Drake Bluenote]], a member of the [[bard]]ic group [[Adagio Jones and The Goodwinds]], played the glaur for mock music.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/54/The New Rogues Gallery: Adagio Jones and The Goodwinds|8-9}}
